headline: Can AppLovin’s Surge Continue After Recent 16.5% Pullback in 2025?
summary: If you’re wondering what to do with AppLovin stock right now, you’re not alone. After all, deciding whether to buy, hold, or cash out has become a real talking point among investors watching this digital advertising technology player. The chart tells a fascinating story: over the last year, AppLovin’s stock has soared by 287.7%, and since the start of the year, it’s up another 66.7%. That said, the last week saw a sharp pullback, with shares sliding 16.5%. Yet, that hardly dents its...
